name: Kabufuda solitaire
description:
This is a solitaire game from the game Last call BBS by Zachtronics. In the original it’s played with the Japanese kabufuda cards. I tried using these cards in the game but it didn’t fit in so I just chose some classic French cards.

Definitely has some problems but it's playable.

Free, simple, opensource.

Attributions:

Pixelated cards by drawsgood

Unused kabufuda cards from Steve’s web pages

Sound effects from freesound.org

Music: Flying unicorn by Ghidorah Flags by lukasfdahl
